title: Ticket #1257: Support multiple EC2 servers
description: Currently, the amazon grid-type in the grid universe can submit jobs to a single EC2 server. The default server is Amazon's, but that can be changed via the config param AMAZON_EC2_URL. Since there are other EC2 servers available, users should be able to submit jobs to multiple EC2 servers, identifying them in the GridResource attribute of the job ad.
